alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 2:47PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Elko County through 315 PM PDT... At 246 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jackpot to 9 miles west of Pequop Summit. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wells, Pequop Summit, Oasis, Contact, Moor Summit and Hd Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County
